Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

THIS IS NOT A RPG RELATED POLL, BUT
PLEASE TAKE TIME TO RESPOND TO IT! THANX! =)
In a second-language learning context,
how would you like one of your school
activities to be to create and
participate in a RPG like this one? 

  o I would like it a lot 
  o It would be okay 
  o Only if I have to 
  o That would suck 
  o I would hate it 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1036404  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
